column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year
“Temporary Resident Visa” shall have the same meaning in the Foreign Exchange (Remittance of Funds by Emigrants)
“Migration  Allowance”  shall  have  the  same  meaning  in  the  Foreign  Exchange  (Remittance  of  Funds  by  Emigrants)
“Remittances”  shall  include  telegraphic  transfers,  other  interbank  transfers,  bank  drafts,  other  payment  instruments,
payments  received  via  other  internationally  accepted  payment  mechanisms  or  platforms  and  funds  received  from
exchange companies/houses in foreign currency from abroad, other than currency notes.
